pages.title: Possessed Mummies
pages.text: Possessed Mummies are non aggressive to Players, but will attack other Hostile Mobs. You can summon 3 Possessed Mummmies using The Staff Of Mummies.

pages.title: Staff Of Mummies
pages.text: The Staff Of Mummies is a powerful magical artifact that can be obtained as a Rare Drop from Anubis.$(br2)The Staff will allow you to summon 3 Possessed Mummies to fight for you for up to one minute. Once the minute has expired the Mummies will die.$(br2)After Using the Staff it will enter a 90 second cooldown. To use the staff simply right click any block.$(br)The Staff can also be used as a Weapon dealing 5 Damage and 1.2 Attack Speed.
